content: across 3sc in last single_crochet turn increase row 9 ch2 does not count as single_crochet st 3sc in first single_crochet 1 single_crochet flo in each of next 6 single_crochet 2sc flo in next single_crochet repeat across 3sc in last single_crochet turn you have my permission to gift donate sell trade barter beam up or enjoy your shawls made from this pattern you have my permission to distribute this pattern but only if you distribute it for free with no charge exactly as printed and give me credit for the design enjoy ☮ mng desperately seeking shallow single_crochet crescent version 2 0 revised sept 1/14 © mng 2014 3  continue with all plain row except for increase row 9 16 23 30 37  continue plain row to row 41 or wherever you want then go on to lace border p 4 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ❤ ❤ ❤ eyelet bands in body version body use 4 5 mm hook note the increase row are not exactly every 7th row here that s okay do the same as extra shallow version row 1 to 13 row 14 ch4 counts as tc st double_crochet & esc in first st chain 1 esc flo in next st twice ch1 sk1 st esc flo across to 4th last st chain 1 esc flo in next st twice esc & double_crochet & tc in last single_crochet turn row 15 ch2 does not count as single_crochet st 3sc in first single_crochet skip 1sc 2sc flo in next single_crochet repeat across sk1sc 3sc in last single_crochet turn row 16 ch1 sk1 esc row 17 increase row c ch2 does not count as single_crochet st 3sc in first single_crochet skip 1sc 2sc flo in next esc skip ch1 2sc flo in next esc skip ch1 3sc flo in next esc 3sc in last single_crochet turn row 18 ch4 counts as tc st 2dc in first single_crochet ch1 skip 1 st esc in next st repeat across ch1 skip 1 st 2dc & 1tc in tch turn row 19 ch2 does not count as single_crochet st 3sc in first single_crochet skip 1sc 2sc flo in next single_crochet repeat across sk1sc 3sc in last single_crochet turn plain row 20 - 22 ch2 does not count as single_crochet st 3sc in first single_crochet single_crochet flo in each single_crochet across 3sc in last single_crochet turn row 23 increase row a ch2 does not count as single_crochet st 3sc in first single_crochet skip 1sc 2sc flo in next esc skip ch1 2sc flo in next esc skip ch1 3sc flo in next esc 3sc in last single_crochet turn plain row 24 ch2 does not count as single_crochet st 3sc in first single_crochet single_crochet flo in each single_crochet across 3sc in last single_crochet turn row 24 ch4 counts as tc st double_crochet & esc in first st chain 1 esc flo in next st twice ch1 sk1 st esc flo across to 4th last st chain 1 esc flo in next st twice esc & double_crochet
